name: There Is No Fangame
description:
lack of the specific person. BUT, if i will be able to do something by myself, then...maybe?

Yeah...i'm already imagining about more ways for you to leave me alone...

If Pascal Cammisotto would read this, do you have anything to say to him?

I would definitely tell him, that i'm impressed of how much people he fooled over past 7 years!

Yes, you coffee-lover guy!

You lied to every player on the world by saying that precious and definitely not overused line: "There is no game"! So, basically, you guarantee to others that there is no gameplay or any fun. AND GUESS WHAT? You sneaked a lot of entertainement! A lot of fun! A lot of GAME! I have absolutely no idea, why people are still not mad at you for that sin!

Well, that at least gonna change for me! Since my content is basically none, my title will NOT lie! HAH! That will definitely teach him a lesson!

Do you have anything else to say, before i fall asleep?

Hmmm...

DO NOT STAY HYDRATED! WATER IS A LIE! LOOK! I HAVE NEVER DRUNK A WATER AND I'M JUST FINE! HAH!*

"There Is No Fangame" created by Bit Studio.

Follow us on Twitter and subcribe to our Youtube Channel to get informed about TINF's updates

Join our Discord Server, if you find any bugs or if you want to join the Bit Studio / There Is No Fangame community!

Available Languages: English, Polish (Polski), Russian (Русский)
[more coming out later...]

*don't take that seriously guys lol, drink a lot of water, love ya all <3

  • This non-fangame is based on "There Is No Game: Wrong Dimension" which is a property of DRAW ME A PIXEL.
  • This project uses some assets that are not created by the author of this (non-)fangame.
  • This project is not affiliated with, endorsed, sponsored, or specifically approved by DRAW ME A PIXEL and DRAW ME A PIXEL is not responsible for it.

BEFORE YOU DOWNLOAD: 
  • If FPS during playing will be way over 60 fps, using third-party FPS Limiters is required in order to play the fangame normally (recommended - RivaTuner Statistic Server). Shout-out to Chiviguagua for streaming that issue!
  • If the game freezes at 33% (nothing is moving) that means that game is loading voicelines, which means that it cannot be closed (loadup takes like 5-10 seconds)
